description: A group of cave people are gathered in a cave setting, holding drinks. A formal social introduction is performed, presenting "Thag" to "Noona." The core absurdity arises from introducing "Thag" not merely by name, but explicitly defining his status using the broad anthropological term "Hunter and Gatherer." This specific use of a descriptive label as a personal identification creates irony by applying modern social formality to a primitive, undifferentiated survival role. The humor highlights the contrast between contemporary professional titles and the basic activities of prehistoric life.
caption: “Thag, this is Noona. Noona, this is Thag. ... Thag is a Hunter and Gatherer.”
